document.para: This is our newest "Cool Tool". This tool can process Microsoft Excel XML (2003) files to XSL FO tables. To use the tool, just set the "Print Area" in Excel to the table you are interested in, You can also set the "Print Titles" for the table to have repeating headers.
This was developed by Kevin Brown and Karl Stubsjoen from RenderX. If you have any questions or have any updates, please contact us!
